description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Newcastle, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Boutique QT Escape in the Heart of Newcastle
hotels.description: A stunning mix of eclectic design and contemporary amenities await at the modern QT Newcastle, a boutique hotel only a short walk away from iconic Newcastle Beach. Saunter to the sand to discover why hundreds flock to its shore to surf and soak up the sun, or explore Newcastle's vibrant city centre - the hedonistic hotel is perfectly perched for both coastal and city escapes. QT's renowned maximalist aesthetic is on full display with a uniquely Newcastle touch, with design elements that pay tribute to the city's waterside location and steel industry history. Brushed copper and metal appear not only in the luxuriously appointed rooms, but across all communal areas, including the rustic Jana Restaurant and Bar. Indulge in sensational steaks and Italian favourites over dinner, before heading upstairs to the sleek Rooftop at QT bar for refreshing handcrafted cocktails with a backdrop of uninterrupted views across the harbour.

hotels.title: Smart Harbourside Stay near Newcastle City Centre
hotels.description: Unspoilt shorelines, an historic harbour and quintessential Australian hospitality are on offer at Holiday Inn Express Newcastle, an IHG hotel. Expect sandy feet and slow days when you explore this harbourside city, with sprawling greenery, endless nature walks and plenty of rich heritage. Take a stroll down the Newcastle Memorial Walk for glistening sea views, learn something new at the local museum or get up close to native animals at Blackbutt Nature Reserve.

hotels.title: Vibrant Newcastle Elegance with Sophisticated Rooftop Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the pinnacle of luxury in the heart of Newcastle, within easy reach of the historic Newcastle East, the vibrant Honeysuckle precinct and the stunning coastline. Dine at Romberg's, the hotel's sophisticated rooftop restaurant offering modern Australian cuisine and a Hunter Valley vineyard-inspired wine list alongside panoramic city vistas. Or sip on artisanal cocktails at Ms Mary, the chic cafe-by-day, wine-bar-by-night.

hotels.title: Laidback Newcastle Stay Moments from the Beach with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the coastal charm of New South Wales with a stay at this perfectly positioned residence, on Newcastle's vibrant foreshore. This stylish hotel is just steps from the golden sands of Newcastle Beach, offering a serene retreat for those seeking a seaside escape. You'll find the the historic Fort Scratchley, the Civic Theatre and Newcastle Art Gallery within easy reach. After a busy day, return to your base to savour locally sourced cuisine and a glass of wine at the onsite Bistro Dalby.

hotels.title: Contemporary Newcastle Airport Stay with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Bask in the modern comforts of this stylish hotel, conveniently located just a short walk from Newcastle Airport. Offering the perfect launchpad for exploring the charms of the Central Coast (or a comfortable stopover), savour a delicious meal at the onsite Mach One Restaurant and Bar, or keep up with your fitness routine at the well-equipped gym. When it's time to explore, the stunning Stockton Beach, the historic Fort Scratchley and the bustling Hunter Street Mall are all within easy reach.

hotels.title: Newcastle Coastal Stay near Hunter River with Onsite Dining & Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Welcome to your slice of harbourside heaven in Newcastle, set within a striking modern building. Imagine sophisticated spaces with a hint of maritime charm, a trendy all-day cafe at Distrikt Press, an inviting outdoor pool for sunny days and stylish rooms you’ll never want to leave. Step outside into Newcastle’s most vibrant precinct. Begin your day with a refreshing dip in the Newcastle Ocean Baths, or explore the popular cafes on Darby Street for that perfect flat white. Ride the waves at Nobbys Beach, soak in the sunset views at Fort Scratchley and dive into the city’s renowned craft beer scene at hotspots like Foghorn Brewery.

seo.title: Hôtels à Newcastle - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Newcastle, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
